name: Timothy Tinyhat - Demo
description:
Welcome to Timothy Tinyhat, I want to indirectly tell the story of a person going through a burnout. 

-

The player will go through that experience from the perspective of a cartoon doodle. I don’t want to dwell on the hardships of burnout, instead I want to highlight the importance of not over working yourself and keeping happy and healthy.

-

-

Full development log here:

https://www.therookies.co/projects/33122
